name: df-xrh
body: |- wceq(cxrh, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cxr, cif(cfv(cfv(crrh, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cif(cfv(cfv(club, cv(s0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(s0)), cr)), cfv(cfv(cglb, cv(s0)), cima(cfv(crrh, cv(s0)), cr)), wceq(cv(s1), cpnf)), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ RR*Hom =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ if(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((RRHom ` s0)` s1), if(s1 = +‚àû,((lub ` s0)`((RRHom ` s0)" ‚Ñù)),((glb ` s0)`((RRHom ` s0)" ‚Ñù))))))
comment: Define an embedding from the extended real number into a complete lattice. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Feb-2018.)
